dependencies.description:
GDAL: Geospatial Data Abstraction Library. GDAL is a translator library
for raster and vector geospatial data formats that is released under an
MIT style Open Source License by the Open Source Geospatial Foundation.
As a library, it presents a single raster abstract data model and single
vector abstract data model to the calling application for all supported
formats. It also comes with a variety of useful command line utilities
for data translation and processing.
dependencies.name: gdal

dependencies.description:
Certifi: A carefully curated collection of Root Certificates for
validating the trustworthiness of SSL certificates while verifying the
identity of TLS hosts.
dependencies.name: py-certifi

dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.
dependencies.name: py-click

dependencies.description:
An extension module for py-click to register external CLI commands via
setuptools entry-points.
dependencies.name: py-click-plugins

dependencies.description:
Common arguments and options for GeoJSON processing commands, using
Click.
dependencies.name: py-cligj

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description:
A Munch is a Python dictionary that provides attribute-style access (a
la JavaScript objects).
dependencies.name: py-munch

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Python script to download global terrain digital elevation models, SRTM
30m DEM and SRTM 90m DEM.
dependent_to.name: py-elevation

dependent_to.description:
GeoPandas is an open source project to make working with geospatial data
in python easier. GeoPandas extends the datatypes used by pandas to
allow spatial operations on geometric types. Geometric operations are
performed by shapely. Geopandas further depends on fiona for file access
and descartes and matplotlib for plotting.
dependent_to.name: py-geopandas

dependent_to.description:
rasterstats is a Python module for summarizing geospatial raster
datasets based on vector geometries. It includes functions for zonal
statistics and interpolated point queries. The command-line interface
allows for easy interperability with other GeoJSON tools.
dependent_to.name: py-rasterstats

dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for
geospatial data.
dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo

description: Fiona reads and writes spatial data files.
name: py-fiona

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
